content.raw: In general, why is `InlineSection` specified every time? If the alternative is in file, presumably the objects would also not be defined for that section? It would be much more streamlined if it could be avoided and internally the API could organize accordingly.
content.html: In general, why is InlineSection specified every time? If the alternative is in file, presumably the objects would also not be defined for that section? It would be much more streamlined if it could be avoided and internally the API could organize accordingly.
